title: New client timer gets stuck in 0

embed.description: Provides free image upload and hosting integration for forums. Free picture hosting and photo sharing for websites and blogs.

body: Every time I start the client on my first game in the champ select screen the timer reaches 0 and it just gets stuck there until it kicks me out for not locking in. This began happening since I updated the client now every day I have to wait 14 or 30+ mins for the dodge penalty. It's not my connection, and I already tried the autofix and downloading the client again... It's getting so frustrating. Is there any way to fix this?

replies.body: When you are in queue, the server needs to grab you and place you in the same room as your group.  Your specific issue looks like you are losing sync and getting left behind.  I recommend using the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune up your network and get back in game.  Hope it helps!
